rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient LED lighting. The design includes a natural stone pathway to connect with the landscaping.
An open-plan living area incorporating large windows for ample daylight, low-emission glass, and integration with the garden view.
A dining space adjacent to the living room designed for family gatherings. Features include bamboo flooring and reclaimed wood accents.
Eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, recycled materials for cabinetry, and plenty of natural ventilation.
A shared balcony overlooking the garden that serves as an outdoor living space.

openings.details: Energy-efficient windows with low-emission glass to maximize natural light.
Weather-resistant doors made of recycled materials.

rooms.description: Luxury master bedroom with spacious balcony, private ensuite bathroom, and Vastu-aligned orientation.
Second bedroom featuring an extended balcony for natural light and a small study area integrated within the space.
A dedicated library space designed with ample shelving, comfortable seating, and natural lighting to promote relaxation and reading.
Master ensuite bathroom for Bedroom 1 with sustainable fixtures and water-saving systems.
Guest Bathroom integrated on the first floor, designed to be eco-friendly.

openings.details: Balcony windows with energy-efficient glass for privacy and ventilation.
Staircase doors built from sustainable timber, ensuring safety and durability.
